Trial_Design.evidence: This was a pre-specified sub-study of two multicenter randomized controlled trials

Participants.evidence: older adults undergoing major elective surgery

Objective.evidence: The primary objective was to evaluate agreement between researchers’ and family members’ postoperative delirium assessment.

Method_Outcome.evidence: Agreement between researcher-rated CAM/CAM-ICU and family-rated FAM-CAM was analyzed using Generalized Linear Mixed Model with repeated measures

Number_Randomised.evidence: A total of 817 patients had 1349 concurrent delirium assessments.

Number_Analysed.evidence: A total of 817 patients had 1349 concurrent delirium assessments.

Result_Outcome.evidence: Repeated measures Cohen’s kappa indicated good overall agreement (kappa = 0.72 [95 % confidence interval, 0.63 to 0.81]).
